quest.name: To Kill a Coeurl
journal: Ortwin has been thinking a lot about the Temple of the Fist lately.

Ortwin explains to you that Rhalgr's Reach used to be a pilgrimage site for followers of the Fist of Rhalgr. Atop the mountain lies the remnants of the Temple of the Fist, which was once the religion's center. Recently, a lady named Marjorie approached Ortwin saying that she wished to explore the temple ruins herself. Ortwin is willing to allow her entry on the condition that you accompany her.

Speaking with Marjorie, you quickly realize she has more than a passing interest in the Fist of Rhalgr. Her curiosity was piqued after attending a lecture given by a historian named Erik. Seeing how desperate she is to explore the Temple of the Fist, you agree to accompany her.

â€»The Temple of the Fist can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

As expected, the temple is filled with various traps and obstacles set up by the monks to aid them in their training. You make your way as far as the Closed Fist, where you do battle with the specter of Ivon Coeurlfist. You head back to meet with Marjorie to tell her just what you saw in the recesses of the temple ruins.

Upon hearing of your meeting with Ivon Coeurlfist, Marjorie decides that she must become a monk and see him for herself. She thanks you for your help and hurries off to begin her training. Only time will tell if she is able to realize her dream of meeting the legendary monk.
objectives: Enter the Temple of the Fist.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, just the womanman I was looking for.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: As you may know, Rhalgr's Reach used to be a pilgrimage site for followers of the Fist of Rhalgr. Atop the mountain lies the remnants of the Temple of the Fist, which was once the center of their religion.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: It was filled with monks training their minds and bodies right up until the mad king Theodoric decided to raze the temple. Curiously enough, a young lady recently approached me saying she wishes to explore the ruins herself.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: I immediately turned down her request, knowing that she alone could not survive the route to the ruins. But then I thought of you. I am positive that you are strong enough to protect her while she explores.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: The girl's name is Marjorie. If you are willing to help, seek her out by the doors which lead to the temple. I imagine she is still there pestering Hrotmar to let her in.

dialogue.name: ORTWIN
dialogue.text: The girl's name is Marjorie. If you are willing to help, seek her out by the doors which lead to the temple. I imagine she is still there pestering Hrotmar to let her in.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: Are you also interested in exploring the Temple of the Fist? I never dreamed I would meet a fellow enthusiast!

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I first learned of monks when I attended a lecture given by a historian named Erik. Ever since then I have continued to be fascinated by their creed and approach to life.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I thought I would come and pay a visit to the site of their most revered temple, now that the Empire has been driven out of the region. The only issue is this man will not let me pass!

dialogue.name: HROTMAR
dialogue.text: The monks used the path to the temple to train. It is filled with all kinds of traps and obstacles that cannot be overcome by just anyone.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: It is precisely those traps and obstacles that I wish to study! Everything I have read states that those who are able to reach the temple will come face-to-face with a monk of legend.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: Does that not pique your curiosity in the slightest? Who knows what kind of lessons one could learn from a monk that has mastered their art. You wish to know, don't you, adventurer?

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: You too are a monk? I can hardly believe my luck! Now I see why you also wish to visit the temple ruins.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: You are the one who helped the Resistance defeat Zenos yae Galvus? Well, you should be more than capable of handling whatever the temple has to throw at you then!

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: In fact, if you are truly keen to explore what lies beyond these doors, would you mind if I joined you?

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I am fairly familiar with the layout of the temple grounds from all the reading I have done. I know I can be of help. Oh, please take me with you!

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I cannot wait to walk upon the very grounds where so many monks trained tirelessly. And that is not to mention the monk of legend who awaits us in the Closed Fist!

dialogue.name: HROTMAR
dialogue.text: Sorry to trouble you like this. Please make sure she makes it through unharmed.

dialogue.name: HROTMAR
dialogue.text: Good to see you safely returned! Were you able to meet this legendary monk in the end?

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I too am most eager to hear just what went on in the Closed Fist.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: You fought with Ivon Coeurlfist!?

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I have read that he honed his martial prowess by wandering the mountains, fighting all the coeurls he could find. They say he took the creatures' movements for his own, devising a style of fighting like no other.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: To think he had been waiting there all this time for a new challenger...

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: My mind is made up. I too will become a monk!

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: Hearing your story, I realized that I must meet Ivon Coeurlfist myself.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: I will need to strengthen both my body and mind to have any chance of reaching him.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: And I plan to start by working on my mind. There is still much I need read about the monks and their religion.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: Or perhaps I would be better served by searching for a local that is versed in the Fist of Rhalgr?

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: Ah, allow me to thank you! I would not have awoken to my true calling had you not shown me the temple ruins.

dialogue.name: MARJORIE
dialogue.text: The next time our paths cross I imagine I will look somewhat different. Until then!

dialogue.name: HROTMAR
dialogue.text: I can definitely say I have never met a monk quite like her. It will be interesting to see just how far she is able to go.
